fields.summary: S3 AccessDenied error responses use resource element for message

comments.body: [~sjones], could you elaborate on "some"? What kind of requests were you making?

[~vasya], you'd have to check the commit to see all the AccessDenied error responses that were changed. The example in the description was from not specifying an X-Amz-Date parameter (i.e. related to EUCA-13049)

[~sjones], [~jhalterman], are these expected responses? {code} curl "http://my-first-s3-bucket-afeab4b8-ae31-4e9a-80e2-57d5d68a3481.s3.g-05-03.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/MyObjectKey?X-Amz-Date=20170131T014328Z&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Expires=602159&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAAE4DBLOKKY6DJLGR%2F20170131%2Fg-05-03%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Signature=ee53b90c01f746ffc5dbd8c7d0aa6d1b503aaf8b95bca81ddb680929b0bd067c" SignatureDoesNotMatchThe request signature we calculated does not match the signature you provided.AWS4-HMAC-SHA256 20170131T014328Z 20170131/g-05-03/s3/aws4_request a31109bf3a37a6a28dc73e78b12fb310afab1f88c6d13b776b6b976284a6ee48e55317e3-cbd8-4947-89af-cf3916bc9fdb {code} or {code} curl "http://my-first-s3-bucket-afeab4b8-ae31-4e9a-80e2-57d5d68a3481.s3.g-05-03.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/MyObjectKe?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Date=20170131T014328Z&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Expires=602159&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAAE4DBLOKKY6DJLGR%2F20170131%2Fg-05-03%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Signature=ee53b90c01f746ffc5dbd8c7d0aa6d1b503aaf8b95bca81ddb680929b0bd067c" SignatureDoesNotMatchThe request signature we calculated does not match the signature you provided.AWS4-HMAC-SHA256 20170131T014328Z 20170131/g-05-03/s3/aws4_request b7e4de623680b7d2a1cc39b1d1dab48562c33e96911634e0514e500e5074138de54b692d-eee7-4c5f-a7a8-982870fbfaca {code} Should we return any error messaging in the resource element?
[~vasya], that is not correct. You have the issue EUCA-13066 which shows the correct response.
[~jhalterman], let's avoid putting any errors/debugging info into the resource element.

Since we already have EUCA-13066 for the SignatureDoesNotMatch error response it may be better to leave this specific case of using the resource element for other content to be fixed in 4.4.1 under that issue.
[~vasya] What are your steps to reproduce the above errors? What kind of request?
[~jhalterman] I've created presigned URLs and removed some parameters (see my requests in the comment above).

I do not see errors in resource element anymore. {code} curl "http://my-first-s3-bucket-27c1fd5a-6a44-46c7-888e-10ae80083a2e.s3.d-22.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/MyObjectKey?X-Amz-Date=20170202T191329Z&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Expires=6359&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAASUXZJ3IUCG2X4DO%2F20170202%2Fd-22%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Signature=bace3c654073c0e6bcfd2a7757752abe208eb18128f415083a3806f90356b706" SignatureDoesNotMatchThe request signature we calculated does not match the signature you provided.b3b5d51c-6095-4008-8268-68fcd9ba0fcd curl "http://my-first-s3-bucket-27c1fd5a-6a44-46c7-888e-10ae80083a2e.s3.d-22.autoqa.qaystems.com:8773/MyObjectKey?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Date=20170202T191329Z&X-Amz-Expires=6359&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAASUXZJ3IUCG2X4DO%2F20170202%2Fd-22%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Signature=bace3c654073c0e6bcfd2a7757752abe208eb18128f415083a3806f90356b706" UNKNOWNa85f5a7e-2a38-40ba-9e9a-c82474d6bb10 curl "http://my-first-s3-bucket-27c1fd5a-6a44-46c7-88ystems.com:8773/MyObject?X-Amz-Date=20170202T191329Z&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Expires=6359&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAASUXZJ3IUCG2X4DO%2F20170202%2Fd-22%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Signature=bace3c654073c0e6bcfd2a7757752abe208eb18128f415083a3806f90356b706" SignatureDoesNotMatchThe request signature we calculated does not match the signature you provided.510001da-b737-452f-8095-13c007b6243d curl "http://my-first-s3-bucket-27c1fd5a-6a44-46c7-888e-10ae80083a2e.s3.d-22.autoqa.qaystems.com:8773/MyObjectKey?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Date=20170202T191329Z&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAASUXZJ3IUCG2X4DO%2F20170202%2Fd-22%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Signature=bace3c654073c0e6bcfd2a7757752abe208eb18128f415083a3806f90356b706"AccessDeniedX-Amz-Expires parameter must be specified.30422f72-d0fa-4df5-bc5b-0b5a2aa85c61 {code} RPM: eucalyptus-4.4.0-0.25783.146.20170201git4c6bdbd.el7.x86_64

[~sjones] It did. Where credentials and access key ids were previously being sent back as resources, now we get a generic error message. Would you prefer to still output those kinds of things in the error message?

[~jhalterman], I don't think we should change this for 4.4, but I would generally say it is better to have info in the wrong format than not at all. I'll check aws/s3 responses for v2 SignatureDoesNotMatch and InvalidAccessKeyId errors and open bugs as needed.
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
